item.title: World's longest flight to be even less comfortable than expected...
item.description:

SYDNEY (BLOOMBERG) - Proposed flights half way around the globe are set to be even less comfortable than expected. That is, if the marathon 20-hour non-stop services from Sydney to London get off the ground at all.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
